website_summaries.verdict: Biolage is known for making hair care products for specific problems, and this product is no exception. Many consumers dealing with thinning hair say it's a game-changer.
pros: Made with a combination of zinc, biotin, and gluco-omega that does an outstanding job removing buildup from hair and follicles
May stimulate hair growth or slow hair loss
Hair not only feels stronger, but seems more resilient after using it
cons: Won't work for everyone, as a few users say that it made their hair feel oily, while several others thought it had a drying effect

customer_reviews.title: Great volumizing shampoos
customer_reviews.text: I have a very short haircut which was great when I was coloring my hair, but as a senior I decided to go gray. It was very thin and showed parts of my scalp. I tried this shampoo and the conditioner gel and voila, it was evident the follicles were thickened and my hair felt cleaner. No scalp showing and I feel good about my new gray hair look.
customer_reviews.author: PJ in Washington

customer_reviews.title: For fine or thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shampoo for someone with fine or thinning hair... Provides a thicker feel and look.... Excellent fragrance too!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Fake... Worse... Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't write reviews unless it's a very good one or the worst product. In this case, it's worst. First, it didn't have a seal. Since it is shipped and sold by Amazon, I have taken it lightly. Dandruff has been developed in the first few weeks. Being a fan of other matrix products, I wanted to give it more time. Huge hair loss from the third week. Simply thrown in the trash. Any 3 dollar shampoo from a convenience store can do a better job than this. If you don't mind losing your hair... please proceed.
customer_reviews.author: I don't lie😉

customer_reviews.title: Effective and decent value
customer_reviews.text: I have lost my thick head of hair as I’ve aged. Very annoying. I’ve tried numerous shampoo/conditioners and this is the best. I don’t particularly care for the minty smell but really like the end result! I think the mint has something to do with the effectiveness. Also it works best when using both the shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Bussell

customer_reviews.title: smells like Tea tree but works great.
customer_reviews.text: If you like the smell of tea tree then you shouldn't have any issues with this shampoo. It makes my hair super soft and not greasy. I just don't love the smell of tea tree, but its not as strong as some other shampoos with the same sent so i can deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and manageable hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo I've ever used and it has a nice smell too. I'm 65, salt and pepper, but really mostly dark brown. I didn't think a shampoo would make a difference in my hair. I was wrong. This makes my hair look fuller, less frizzy, and easy to manage and comb. I have an old style man's business haircut, part on the left side and I keep it medium cut - it doesn't touch my ears or my collar. I will continue to use this shampoo and I would think it would work great on any length hair.
customer_reviews.author: DogStarDon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.text: I used this shampoo last night and combed my hair was amazed no hair came out and combed my hair this morning hardly any hair fell out usually I loose a lot of hair and have baby fine hair . yes this made a difference .I will continue to use .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because it was listed as making one's hair feel stronger and thicker; I've not experienced either of these features yet and have been using it for several weeks now. The smell is pleasant, and you don't need to use much product to get a full lather. I feel it is a more costly than necessary, especially since it didn't deliver the thickness and strength I was expecting and looking for. I wouldn't buy it again, not because there's anything wrong with the product, it just didn't fulfill the need that I had!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie W. W.

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this shampoo, as my hair has thinned out over the years and thought this might help. I have tried less expensive volumizing shampoos, but they didn't really work. I have to say I have been pleasantly surprised with the results of this Biolage Advance Full Density Shampoo. It did not disappoint! I also use the Biolage Advance Full Density Conditioner. They are a bit pricey, but definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy P.

customer_reviews.title: Not a real matrix product
customer_reviews.text: Not a real matrix product should have read reviews prior to buying
customer_reviews.author: morrison

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if this is real biolage because I’ve used their products for years and tried all of them and every one of them smell sooo good. This product smells really bad. I am going to check with a local retailer in regard to the smell and if they don’t feel this is the real thing I am sending back
customer_reviews.author: Bas

customer_reviews.title: WOW. From thin to thick hair in one wash!!! So impressed ❤
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed have seen huge results after one use and continues to look thicker after each wash. I'm so happy with this product.. scent has a bit of tea tree scent fresh smell. My hair was so thin and it's so thick now! Cannot believe how much it has helped 110%...so thick..
customer_reviews.author: amy lodge

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help my hair at all unfortunately. I will not purchase again. Very expensive and caused my hair to be rather limp instead of volumized or thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, my hair is fine and hard to manage and with this shampoo (also got conditioner) I have really been able to see a difference! Thank you for such great products, finally done looking!
customer_reviews.author: j herald

customer_reviews.title: Love Biolage-this one smells weird
customer_reviews.text: This works well and is worth the money, but definitely has a strong chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Codilind21

customer_reviews.title: make sure you want mint fragrance
customer_reviews.text: ive used biolage for years and never had any shampoo smell like mint, its not pleasant to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Biolage thickening shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my hair because my hair is very thin. I really like this shampoo and I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Childs

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it's possible for a shampoo to thicken your hair, but I really feel like it works. After I use it, my hair feels a little "bigger." Minty smell.
customer_reviews.author: Piggles

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. I'd like to find this in an economical size. I like the shampoo but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lprp8

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it can do
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it leaves my hair clean, shiny and full of body.
customer_reviews.author: Summergal

customer_reviews.title: NOT for fine hair...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shampoo & conditioner & liked the mint smell but was disappointed that it did NOT add volume to my hair and actually made it flatter.
customer_reviews.author: apf9930

customer_reviews.title: It works, not alot to say about a shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Its very good shampoo and conditioner. It cleans my hair well and doesn't take alot. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Been using this product for years I would use nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years I would use nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Works and does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and is worth the money. Gives volume to your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Crusher

customer_reviews.title: It actually seems to thicken my hair
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. Cleans well. Leaves your hair soft and shiney. Recommend the conditioner too.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous line
customer_reviews.text: Best product I used. My hair Is so full of body and lush. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my hair soft and gives it extra volume. No greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps to thicken hair
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work pretty well: my hair does seem to be a little bit thicker
customer_reviews.author: Monica Witte

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shampoo. Very thick and helped thicken my hair which is getting finer over time
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a month, good one. Use it along conditioner for better result.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Usman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, if I dont comb my hair after I wash and condition, my hair forms the best curls using this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Jessamy

customer_reviews.title: Gave my hair body.
customer_reviews.text: Good shampoo, has a nice scent and gave my hair body.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Samuels

customer_reviews.title: ... the first time I've ordered internet and I'm totally pleased with the product received and the service
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ordered internet and I'm totally pleased with the product received and the service, as well. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it will help my hair to be fuller!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the shampoo, but time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! SO lite it doesn't weigh my hair down and it takes just enough of the oil out to keep my scalp dry but not my ends. Thanks Biolage!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair dry and frizzy
customer_reviews.text: I've used Biolage hair products for years, but this shampoo isn't their best. For one, it has a "minty fresh" scent that I'm not crazy mad about. If I wanted to wash my hair with toothpaste, that's always an option. I necessarily must wash, rinse and repeat with this product to get my hair clean, and then I need a hard core conditioner to follow. It is extremely drying to my hair and scalp. It's a relatively expensive product so I won't buy it again, but your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Dunn

product_meta.title: BIOLAGE Advanced Full Density Thickening Shampoo |Removes Impurities For Thicker, Fuller-Looking Hair | Paraben-Free | For Thin Hair
product_meta.description:
Size:13.5 Fl OzBIOLAGE Advanced addresses hair’s most distinct needs through an effective blend of botanicals and molecular science. A thickening breakthrough. The BIOLAGE Advanced Full Density system is designed to reduce hair loss and delivers luscious, thicker-feeling hair. BIOLAGE Advanced Full Density Shampoo is the ideal cleansing method for thin hair. This anti-frizz shampoo, formulated with biotin, zinc PCA, and Gluco-Omega Blend, gently cleanses hair, removing follicle clogging impurities, instantly making hair look and feel healthier. When used as a hair treatment with Full Density Conditioner, hair breakage is significantly reduced, creating fuller-looking, thicker-feeling hair. For maximum results, use this shampoo with Full Density Densifying Spray Treatment, which works on the surface of each hair strand to expand the hair diameter. This product is paraben free and perfect for all hair types, from curly hair to long, straight hair.

BRAND STORY
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in professional haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality, stylist-favorite products powered by botanicals.
